participant_1.name: Elyssa
participant_1.personality: Elyssa is cheerful and imaginative, with a love for Disney and singing. She enjoys playing with friends and has a vibrant personality.
participant_1.background: i have a broken arm. my favourite skater is rob dryden. i am always wearing a hat. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is playful and adventurous, always eager to explore new things. He enjoys creative activities and has a love for stories.
participant_2.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i am in the third grade.

content.text: I love going to Disney World every year
My favorite character is Mickey Mouse
I also like to sing frozen the movie songs
